title: Medical Practice Competency Enhancement: Improvement Science-Based Programs for Strengthening Field Experience of Prospective Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will systematically analyze problems occurring during field practice and derive improvement plans using improvement science methodologies
Learners will standardize the instructional design-execution-evaluation process by applying the POP (Plan-Observe-Reflect) cycle protocol
Learners will collect and analyze field experience data using digital tools, and enhance teaching competencies through reflective practice
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
